metadata.synopsis: This fight occurs in the basement of the last light inn. Meenlocks are clawed fey creatures. If the player passes a check they identify them and their most dangerous aspect, otherwise they simply reccognise  what the meenlocks are and realise they are sensitive to light (light spell or torch for instance). If they fail, they can make note of their sharp claws (for instance.)
metadata.how_to_trigger: Begin the fight the meenlocks beneath last light (can also be accessed from the 'honeymoon lodge')
